channel.title: Welcome to Technical writing mentorship program on TWMP
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Technical writing mentorship program on TWMP

item.title: Authors
item.description: These fantastic folks volunteered their time and skills to create this Open Source Markdown Course for Beginners. It’s packed with useful stuff and totally FREE for everyone!

item.title: Authors
item.description: These fantastic folks volunteered their time and skills to create this Open Source Technical Writing Course for Beginners. It’s packed with useful stuff and totally FREE for everyone!

item.title: Best practices and tips in markdown
item.description: This detailed guide covers how to write quality markdown documents easier and faster. You will also find the top markdown tools to create markdown files seamlessly.

item.title: Getting Started with Markdown
item.description: This detailed guide covers how to Set Up Markdown Tools, markdown basic syntaxes and Formatting and how to Structure Contents in Markdown.

item.title: Intro to technical writing
item.description: This detailed guide covers the fundamentals of technical articles, effective technical writing strategies, various types of technical documentation, identifying your target audience, and the essential steps in the technical writing process.

item.title: Managing Technical Writing Projects
item.description: Build a solid foundation in project management practices for effective technical documentation

item.title: What is Content Marketing?
item.description: Content Marketing Content marketing is a sales strategy that shares unique, compelling content to attract and engage a target audience.

item.title: How To Use Visual Studio Code For Beginners
item.description: Photo Credit: Neowin Are you enthusiastic about exploring the Visual Studio code editor as a noob?. If yes, this article is for you.

item.title: GSoC for Beginners: A Guide to Google Summer of Code
item.description: Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is an annual program sponsored by Google that helps introduce students and open-source beginners to software development.

item.title: Master the Basics of SEO Using Semrush
item.description: Search engine optimization(SEO) focuses on optimizing website content for better visibility on the search engine result page (SERP). The goal is to drive organic traffic/results that are not paid i.
